title: Stranger Things
summary: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, supernatural forces, and a strange little girl.

title: Money Heist
summary: A group of robbers, led by a mastermind known as 'The Professor,' plan and execute heists on the Royal Mint of Spain and the Bank of Spain.

title: Mindhunter
summary: Two FBI agents pioneer modern criminal profiling as they delve into the psyches of serial killers to solve brutal murders.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
summary: Chronicles the reign of Queen Elizabeth II from her early days to modern times, navigating political and personal events.

title: Transformers Prime
summary: A humanoid horse, BoJack Horseman, navigates his washed-up status as a 90s sitcom star while dealing with personal struggles.
